channel.title: Is private cloud virtualization platform privacy-friendly as a potential solution?
channel.description: Is that a good idea if I set up whonix vms on ovirt, openstack or red hat virtualization(RHV) on a rack server and use/manage it remotely from webui, ssh or rdp? Is there any potential negative side compare with install on a pc environment? Thanks!

item.title: Is private cloud virtualization platform privacy-friendly as a potential solution?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
